entry.title: icanhazip.com
entry.summary:
Posted on 6 December, 2014 by Eric Bailey
Tags: hack, bash, script

Often, I find myself needing to know the public IP address of a box I'm hacking on. icanhazip.com has become my favorite tool for the task. 

𝛌 curl icanhazip.com # yass, u can

In my experiments it was the fastest, and I've got a penchant for KISSing.

I made a gist with a few backups, just in case.
